{"scenario":["gardening", "food"]}
{"scenario":["Banana as a snack", "Banana as a fruit", "Banana as a base for smoothies", "Banana as a topping for ice cream", "Banana as a baking ingredient"]}

{
  "scenario": [
    {
      "name": "Banana bread recipe",
      "description": "A recipe for banana bread that uses mashed bananas as the main ingredient",
      "ingredients": [
        "2 large ripe bananas",
        "1/4 cup vegetable oil",
        "2 large eggs",
        "2 cups all-purpose flour",
        "1 teaspoon baking powder",
        "1/2 teaspoon baking soda",
        "1/2 teaspoon salt",
        "1 cup granulated sugar"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).",
        "Mash the bananas in a large mixing bowl.",
        "Add the vegetable oil, eggs, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar to the bowl with the mashed bananas.",
        "Mix the ingredients until a smooth batter forms.",
        "Pour the batter into a greased 9x5 inch loaf pan.",
        "Bake for 50-60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.",
        "Let the loaf cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving."
      ]
    }
  ]
}
